Package dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.gui

Class MagicGui

java.lang.Object
dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.gui.MagicGui
public class MagicGui extends Object
Advanced GUI system with MiniMessage support and convenience methods.

  • Constructor Summary

    • MagicGui

      public MagicGui(org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin plugin, org.bukkit.entity.Player owner, int size, String title)
      Creates a new MagicGui with String title.
      Parameters:
      plugin - the plugin instance
      owner - the player who owns this GUI
      size - the size of the inventory
      title - the title of the GUI (supports MiniMessage)

      owner - the player who owns this GUI
      size - the size of the inventory
      title - the title component of the GUI

      public void makeEditable(int slot, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack placeholder, boolean consumesItem)
      Make a slot editable with optional placeholder.
      Parameters:
      slot - the slot to make editable
      placeholder - placeholder item (null for no placeholder)
      consumesItem - true if placing item should consume it from player inventory

    • makeEditable

      Make a slot editable with optional placeholder and change callback.
      Parameters:
      slot - the slot to make editable
      placeholder - placeholder item (null for no placeholder)
      consumesItem - true if placing item should consume it from player inventory
      onChange - callback when item changes

      placeholderMaterial - placeholder material (null for no placeholder)
      placeholderName - placeholder name
